title: (if any) as may be specified by order under section 12A of the Companies Act
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Section
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Section 

12A(1)) (Covid-19) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited company act 2014 (section 12a(1)) (covid-19) order 2023 (2) order come operation 1 january 2024

title: (if any) as may be specified by order under section 12A of the Companies Act
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the Companies (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the Companies (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 9 of 2020).
text_norm: 2 order act 2020 mean company (miscellaneous provisions) (covid-19) act 2020 (no 9 2020)

title: (if any) as may be specified by order under section 12A of the Companies Act
heading: 3. The period beginning on 1 January 2024 and ending on 31 December
text_raw:
3. The period beginning on 1 January 2024 and ending on 31 December 
2024 is hereby specified as the period to which the interim period as defined in 
section 2 (amended by section 3 of the Act of 2020) of the Companies Act 
2014 (No. 38 of 2014) shall be extended in respect of the amendments effected 
by the following sections of the Act of 2020: 

(a) 

sections 3 and 4; 

(b) 

sections 6 to 9; 

(c) 

section 11; 

(d) 

sections 15 to 16; 

(e) 

sections 18 to 25. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

12 December, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
